usefulItems: 2L jug, fine-mesh sieve, sealable storage jars, refrigerator
title: Fish stock

ingredients.content: 300 - 500 g fish bones, cut into pieces (approx. 5 cm - see Tips)

preparations.content: Place all ingredients into mixing bowl and cook <b>30 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Using a fine-mesh sieve, carefully strain stock into a large jug and set aside to cool. Discard solids. Once cool, use as needed or cover and store in refrigerator for up to 3 days.

hintsAndTricks: You can buy fish bones from your local fishmonger. You can also use fish heads; it will give the stock a darker colour.
